comment: The indiscrete topology on a set ` A ` . Part of Example 2 in [Munkres] p. 77. (Contributed by FL, 16-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Stefan Allan, 6-Nov-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
